name: Generate a successful purchase

testSteps.description: Example #1: {srtUsername=standard_user, srtPassword=secret_sauce, srtName=Liz, srtLastName=Ortega, srtCodePostal=630002, srtMessageFinal=Thank you for your order!}

children.description: Given the user wants to purchase three products, she enters in the home page

When the user  tries to authenticate whit theirs credentials
| username | password |
| 'standard_user' | 'secret_sauce' |
And the user has sorted the products from lowest to highest value
And the user adds to the cart the lowest priced product, the highest priced product and another product with any price
And the user navigates to the cart page and removes one of the products

And the user completes the checkout process, enters the required data and continues with the purchase
| name | lastName | codePostal |
| Liz | Ortega | 630002 |
Then the user validates the total items
And the user validates the total price
And user validates purchase success total with a message + 'Thank you for your order!'

userStory.storyName: As a saucedemo user, I need to purchase some of your products.

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user wants to purchase three products, she enters in the home page
When the user  tries to authenticate whit theirs credentials
And the user has sorted the products from lowest to highest value
And the user adds to the cart the lowest priced product, the highest priced product and another product with any price
And the user navigates to the cart page and removes one of the products
And the user completes the checkout process, enters the required data and continues with the purchase
Then the user validates the total items
And the user validates the total price
And user validates purchase success total with a message + '<srtMessageFinal>'
